entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
